csraFeaturesCnt1: Support for multiple domains. Inbuilt pool of domain experts.
csraFeaturesCnt2: Option for using customer list of reviewers. Conflict of Interest Detection based on large knowledge bases.
csraFeaturesCnt3: Explanation of reasons for conflict of interest. Conflict discrepancy analysis.
csraFeaturesCnt4: Top N reviewers per submission. Most relevant papers to submission for each top reviewer.

DashbrdDfltCnt: Let us begin with required info to run the system
ques1: Submission system used by your conference?
ques2: Do you want to upload a file for a list of reviewers?
ques3: If selected yes upload reviewer file
ques4: Did you run the system before with a list of reviewers and system reported some reviewers as missing from database. Do you want to include those missing reviewers this time?
ques5: If selected yes upload name and one paper title for missing reviewers
ques6: Run system with conflicts of interest?
ques7: Do you want to upload a file with conflicts identified  by reviewers?
ques8: If selected yes upload file with conflicts identified by reviewers
ques9: Do you want to upload a file with load per reviewer?
ques10: If selected yes upload file for the load per reviewer
ques11: Do you want forced assignments for certain reviewers and submission pairs?
ques12: If selected yes upload file for forcing reviewers to review certain papers
